description: The content to display as the label.
The current value of the date input (controlled).
The default value of the date input (uncontrolled).
The variant of the date input.

type: default | primary | secondary | success | warning | danger
description: The color of the date input.
The size of the date input.
The radius of the date input.
A placeholder time that influences the format of the placeholder shown when no value is selected. Defaults current date at midnight.
The minimum allowed date that a user may select.
The maximum allowed date that a user may select.
The locale to display and edit the value according to.
A description for the date input. Provides a hint such as specific requirements for what to choose.
An error message for the date input.
The position of the label.
Whether user input is required on the input before form submission.
Whether the input can be selected but not changed by the user.
Whether the input is disabled.
Whether the input value is invalid.
Whether the element should receive focus on render.
Whether to hide the time zone abbreviation.
Whether to disable animations.
